This test documents Blink's web-exposed policy-controlled features.
All changes to this list should go through Blink's feature review process: http://www.chromium.org/blink#new-features

accelerometer
autoplay
camera
ch-device-memory
ch-downlink
ch-dpr
ch-ect
ch-lang
ch-rtt
ch-ua
ch-ua-arch
ch-ua-full-version
ch-ua-mobile
ch-ua-model
ch-ua-platform
ch-ua-platform-version
ch-viewport-width
ch-width
document-domain
encrypted-media
fullscreen
geolocation
gyroscope
magnetometer
microphone
midi
payment
picture-in-picture
publickey-credentials-get
screen-wake-lock
sync-xhr
usb
xr-spatial-tracking
